website_summaries.verdict: A bit expensive, and it's good for making pizza only.
pros: This pizza stone rivals some top contenders in terms of taste, but it costs less
cons: Flimsy controls and replacement parts not available
If it breaks, you'll have to get another one, and these units aren't cheap

customer_reviews.title: Messy, but makes great pizza
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza maker. I have a pizza stone and have used that in the past, but this actually works a lot better. Makes extremely crispy pizza. My only suggestion for people using it is to make sure you use flour to dust the stone in the pizza-maker before you put the dough down, and put the dough down before you put on toppings. Making the pizza on counter and then trying to move it to the pizza had some very messy results.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rand

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This pizzeria is popular in my household. It makes a good pizza and is easy to use. We use it often. One of our paddles fell apart the first time we used it though so I had to buy another one. Store that ships it was so slow. I received many items I ordered days after I ordered this before this finally was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Pizza comes out great but it's tricky to control temperature
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy inaccurate controls. It does the job though. Pizza comes out great but it's tricky to control temperature. I got another one Breville and got rid of this one. The Breville has a window and better, more solid controls.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am an idiot, but this thing does not work for me. The pizza sticks, every single time. Then it burns. And then the cheese melts and burns as well. I am sad. i so wanted this to be awesome. It looks super cute though.

customer_reviews.title: We love this oven
customer_reviews.text: We love this oven....It has paid for itself 10 times over and we are now buying them as gifts since we use ours so much. Its a fun way to have a pizza party and let everyone make their own pizza. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this appliance. We have used it so much since we received it and actually tried to purchase another one for a gift but the price has almost doubled since our purchase. I would recommend this to anyone. The pizzas have turned out excellent and it is a big favorite here in this house. We have had no issues and preparation as directed produces terrific products. My only tip would be to keep a close eye on your pizza till you understand how long it takes to bake to ensure you do not overcook. It is really fast.
customer_reviews.author: gsdwalker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gadget
customer_reviews.text: I gave this pizza oven to my grandson at Christmas. He and his family have used it every day since, saying that it now lives on their counter since they never put it into a cabinet. They report that it works incredibly fast and never have had a failure despite trying all sorts of toppings on their dough. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for freshly home-made pizzas. We all love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST PIZZA MAKER I EVER HAD WORKS LIKE A PRO

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a home pizza enthusiast for about a year now, trying multiple cast-iron pizza stones, different flours, ect.. I love it! The one weakness is for a medium size pizza (about 12 inches), but it gets very hot and cooks a pizza made with fresh dough in 5-6 minutes. The crust cooks at the same pace as the top, so you don't have to pre-cook the crust like I had to on my pizza stones. It is easy to clean, and comes with a nice split pizza-tray to help load and unload. It's electric powered so it can be used inside, I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: mgn2282

customer_reviews.title: pizza

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pizza oven. It is fairly well designed and affords the user more flexibility in pizza thickness. The unit provides good to better than most oven characteristics. Although due to the variations in pizzas one must use experience as a guide to proper cooking times. The overall construction does not approach the sturdiness of others made with a cast aluminum body but considering the purpose for which this unit is made the construction should be sound enough to last many years. I really like this unit and recommend it over others costing much more.
customer_reviews.author: Eliott Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Oh..OMG..THIS IS THE BEST WAY TO MAKE A FROZEN PIZZA!!!! Who wants to heat an entire oven for one pizza?! This unit gets very hot. As a matter of fact, read the reviews and the instructions. Baking on 'high' is too hot...unless you're making frisbees. We have been thrilled with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This pizza maker is amazing!!! Now every play date my son has at home must have pizza and I am very happy to be able to make it at home! It's a great family and friends plan as well since you can make your own in less than 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Angel

customer_reviews.title: Didnt even last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 3 months, heating element just stopped. Warrenty is only for 3 months and they would not help us.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't get hot enough to cook a full size pizza fast enough to get a good crust. I do better in my electric oven. I think a much smaller, thinner pizza might work better. It is real handy and fast for reheating pizza or other items with the non-stick, deep dish pan installed. I do like that feature because it gets them crisp. None of the sogginess of the microwave, and fast. Reheating french fries or chicken wings works well too. And the pan is easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Satz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions! Frozen pizza perfect in 5 minutes! Crispy bottom without burning. Cheese melted perfectly. Adjust temp as you trial it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: If you like burned pizza....
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand all the positive comments on this unit. It burns things and it takes forever to reach temperature. Awful product which we returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Edelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after learning curve
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews on Amazon. The first pizza, I followed the instructions.....heating on 1 and cooking on 2-2 1/2...the top was a tad too brown..still a good pizza though. Next time, I followed the advice of another poster and preheated on 3, then cooked on 1 1/2... Perfect top and bottom thin crust pizza. Used homemade dough from artisan bread in 5 min pizza book. I definitely recommend this little pizzeria!!! It is very fast, doesn't heat up your kitchen and one little pizza is perfect for two with a side salad. LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mort65

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried this oven, I did what I always do.. dive in with no instructions! Mistake! I cooked my first pizza at the highest setting thinking that is what it would need to get done in 5 minutes. The end result was my crust was burned and I a bit disappointed. Several months later, I drug it out and read up on how too. Tonight's results were perfect! and 2 pizzas cooked in under 4 minutes!!! Perfectly! Thank you! What a great gadget!
customer_reviews.author: laurie perez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!!! This pizza oven is incredible. If you are going to make your own fresh pizza at home, you can't beat this unit. You can make your own Designer/Boutique pizza right at home! I have been using this unit about a year and half now, with no problems, just Great Pizza!!!!! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rebtoy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little pizza maker and our grands love making pizzas
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pizza maker and our grands love making pizzas. The only problem we have is in transferring the assembled pizza to the hot stone, but even with that glitch I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: pate

customer_reviews.title: its best
customer_reviews.text: Just love it!!not only pizza I can make/cook anything ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Ayse Sucan

customer_reviews.title: It bakes super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said they have problems transferring the dough onto the pizza stone with all the toppings on the dough. I had that problem too at first and I don't care for the included two halves of the pizza peel. What I do now is after forming or rolling out my dough I just pick it up and put it on the stone for a few seconds with the lid up and sometimes flip it for a few seconds and now you have a slightly stiffer dough to add your toppings ( without making the dough soggy ) and you can handle the pizza without even using a peel.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Best $99 dollars I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Best $99 dollars I ever spent. I have a $ 2500 wood fired oven and use this little grill when'd I want to test dough or make just one pizza. It is not as good as my WFO, but it gets to 750 degrees in about 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today, and I tried it. This little guy heats up ver fast and cook pizza very quickly. I need to play with this unit more to perfect my pizza. I used home made par baked multigrain pizza base. Also made dessert pizza as per my sons request, it made my stone little bit messy, next time I'll use parchment paper to line my stone. This product lost one star because of low quality pizza paddle, just with one use it concave from middle. I will update as I use more with fresh dough.
customer_reviews.author: Bhakti Pathak

customer_reviews.title: Another 5 star Review
customer_reviews.text: My pizzas taste much better now with the pizzeria!!! The crust is crispy and not soggy and it only takes 5 minutes to bake a pizza. I learned not to store the wood peels in the pizzeria and then preheat. Yep. The peels were cheap anyway and now I can look for a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: kimbo

product_meta.title: Newwave The Petite Pizzeria LD-902SLT
product_meta.description: Ideal for either fresh or frozen pizza crusts, this innovative countertop pizza oven heats to over 600°F quickly and cooks a perfectly crisp pizza in as few as five minutes. Bake a crispy, 12" crust as thin as you’d like on the ceramic pizza stone, or use the nonstick deep-dish pizza pan for your favorite Chicago-style pizzas. You can also transport and serve your pizzas like a pro with the included paddles. Features dual W-shaped heating elements and convenient heat-control dial. Compact size for easy storage. Manufacturer: NewWave. Material: Ceramic, nonstick coating and metal. Care: Hand wash ceramic stone and nonstick pizza pan; wipe oven body clean with dry cloth. Avoid using soap when washing ceramic stone. Includes: Pizza oven, ceramic pizza stone, nonstick deep-dish pizza pan and wooden paddles. Dimensions: 6" product height; 12" cooking-surface diameter. Wattage: 1200 watts. Made in China.
